mapper.select: SELECT i.is_sold, i.item_no, p.model, p.e_name, ss.size_value AS 'shoe_size', i.price, model_image_url as thImg FROM items i INNER JOIN product p ON i.pno = p.pno INNER JOIN shoe_size ss ON i.shoe_size = ss.size_id INNER JOIN model_image mi ON p.model = mi.model_number WHERE i.buyer_email = #{email} GROUP BY i.item_no ORDER by i.reg_at DESC
